1124.quoteText:
As we continue to develop our business, we might sell or buy additional services or business units.
In such transactions, user information generally is transferred along with the rest of the service or business unit.
Also, in the event that IMDb.com, Inc., or substantially all of its assets are acquired, user information will of course be included in the transaction
1124.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
tosdr.tldr: The policy states that: “in the event that IMDb.com, Inc., or substantially all of its assets are acquired, user information will of course be included in the transaction.” but it doesn't say if the information may then be used for other purposes after the transaction.

6149.quoteText: We use web beacons (also known as “action tags” or “single-pixel gifs”) and other technologies to measure the effectiveness of certain site features and to conduct research and analysis.
6149.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

6150.quoteText: Promotional Offers: Sometimes we send offers to selected groups of IMDb users on behalf of other businesses. When we do this, we do not give that business your name and e-mail address. If you do not want to receive such offers, please use our User Administration pages to adjust your preferences.
6150.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

6151.quoteText:
These third-party websites and advertisers, or Internet advertising companies working on their behalf, sometimes use technology to send (or "serve") the advertisements that appear on our website directly to your browser.
They automatically receive your IP address when this happens.
They may also use cookies, JavaScript, web beacons (also known as action tags or single-pixel gifs), and other technologies to measure the effectiveness of their ads and to personalize advertising content.
6151.title: This service allows tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including targeted advertising.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

6152.quoteText:
IMDb is not intended for use by children under the age of 13.
If you are under 13, you may not submit information about yourself to IMDb.
6152.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age

6153.quoteText: If you choose to visit IMDb, your visit and any dispute over privacy is subject to this Notice and our Terms and Conditions of Use, including limitations on damages, resolution of disputes, and application of the law of the state of Washington.
6153.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

6161.quoteText: However, because cookies allow you to take full advantage of some of IMDb's essential features, we recommend that you leave them turned on.
6161.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

6162.quoteText: This Notice and the Terms and Conditions of Use will change also, and use of information that we gather now is subject to the Privacy Notice in effect at the time of use.
6162.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

6163.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

6164.quoteText: We may e-mail periodic reminders of our notices and conditions, unless you have instructed us not to, but you should check our Web site frequently to see recent changes.
6164.title: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement

tosdr.case: The service makes critical changes to its terms without user involvement
